Posts.Title: 3 Effin Weeks ? craftybiatchy bevin

Posts.Content: Oct 12, 2012 11:14AM dkellyhsu wrote: You and I can wait together.  Waiting with a bit of hope is a whole lot better than waiting with dread.  On my first biopsy, no one knew anything other than it wasn't a cyst and it was irregular which gave me a sense of dread.  That one came back B9, but some atypical cells so I had to have another to make sure.  Today was the other, and I have another week to wait for the results too, but I'm not nearly as freaked out this time as I was the first time around.
